hero.title: Elevate Events
hero.subtitle: Luxury redefined. Formerly Tribe – Music & Smoking Lounge

about.title: From Tribe to Elevate
about.text: Elevate Events GmbH represents a new era in luxury hospitality. Building on the legacy of Tribe – Music & Smoking Lounge, Elevate introduces a world-class experience where fine design, curated events, and exclusivity come together in perfect harmony.

membership.title: Become a VIP Member
membership.text: Unlock exclusive access, special discounts, and priority bookings. Elevate your experience.
